casebody.data:
Messenger v. Metropolitan El. Ry. Co. et al., (two cases.) (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. February 13, 1891.) Appeal from special term. Action by Henry Messenger against the Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company and others, and by John Messenger against the same defendants. There was a judgment for plaintiffs in both cases, and defendants appeal.

Argued before Sedgwick, Freedman, and Ingraham, JJ.

Samuel Blythe Rogers, for appellant. James B. Ludlow, for respondents. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
